Interface TopicDao

extends Dao<Topic>

      • createWithGeneratedDate

        boolean createWithGeneratedDate(Topic entity)
                         throws PersistenceException
        Adds topic to the database with date generated by database.
        Parameters:
        entity - Topic to add.
        Returns:
        true if topic was successfully added, else returns false
        Throws:
        PersistenceException - if SQLException is thrown

        Finds topic by title.
        Parameters:
        title - Topic title
        Returns:
